name: P.T. Emulation
description:
So I finally made it. After hard months of work, I want to share with you the emulated and recreated P.T. directly from PS4 to PC. Each of us deserves to experience the scariest game of all time. Play for free now! Happy Halloween!

Follow me : twitter.com/arturlaczkowski

Support me: www.patreon.com/arturgames

! GAME SUPPORTS ONLY GAMEPAD, MOUSE IS ONLY FOR MENU !
